channel.title: Help with testscape, getting xp
channel.description: Ok, i want to change the speed of attacking doors, haybails and dummys also range, cos at the moment you can keep clicking to get xp. I want to slow this down to say 1 click every 3 seconds. Anyone help me with this please?

item.title: Help with testscape, getting xp
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Here is the Posted Turturial about that

[quote=“ganonluvesu, post:1, topic:35532”]Purpose: Ok the whole point of this is to speed up the exp you get from training dummys, doors and hay bails

Difficulty:1

Assumed Knowledge: Ctrl + F in notepad/wordpad, Reading skills, and how to use a mouse and keyboard.

Server Base: Most i believe, Testscape works [u]in pimpscape u need to change the cases[u]

Classes Modified: CLIENT.JAVA

Procedure:

Step 1: Do ctrl + F and find this

 public boolean addSkillXP(int amount, int skill){

Step 2: Change it to this:

public boolean addSkillXP(int amt, int skill){

Step 3: Place this underneath it

int amount = amt * 400; // 100 = multiplier

Step 4: Now it should look like this

public boolean addSkillXP(int amt, int skill) {int amount = amt * 400; // 100 = multiplier

Credits: ME and i believe i haven’t seen this since the MASS CLEANUP so i posted ;D[/quote]

That was a posted turturial

www.godofikiliki.us.tt

Read full topic
